try1
2022-07-05




``{r} web_url <- “https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_U.S._states_and_territories_by_carbon_dioxide_emissions”
raw_data_wiki <- web_url |> read_html() |>
html_element(“.wikitable.sortable”) |> html_table()
clean_wiki <- raw_data_wiki |> rename(“state” = “Jurisdiction”,
“e_per_capita” =
Annual CO2 emissions  per capita(in metric tons)) |>
select(state, e_per_capita) |> filter(state != “States, D.C. and
territories total”, state != “States and D.C. Total”, state != “U.S.
Virgin Islands”, state != “District of Columbia”, state != “Guam”, state
!= “American Samoa”, state != “Northern Mariana Islands”, # state !=
“Alaska”, # state != “Hawaii”, state != “Puerto Rico”) |>
rename(NAME= state) |> mutate(e_per_capita =
parse_number(e_per_capita))

``{r}
pop <- get_decennial(geography = "state",
                     variables = "P001001",
                     year = 2010,
                     output="wide",
                     geometry=TRUE) |> 
  # merge(pop, clean_wiki, by = "NAME")
  # mutate(capita = clean_wiki$e_per_capita)
``{r} pop |> filter(! NAME %in% c(“Alaska”, “Hawaii”, “Puerto
Rico”)) |> ggplot(fill=e_per_capita) + geom_sf() ```
